column4: in synaptic, check the properties of gcc-3.3, and find out where it puts things
for future reference, alot of people's audio problems (where it half works, but some apps just don't get sound) are related to a current snafu with the flash plugin

I installed the adobe flash nonfree one and youtube now works but some other site instead said 'flash player 8 or above and javascript need to be enabled'. JS was enabled and its flash 9 on here so i'm not sure what the prob was
wasn't spike.com by any chance was it?
Don't remember. I'll get back to you if it happens again
not yet, but you can turn on the screen resolution applet which will make it fairly accessible
system | prefs | screen resolution | "show displays in panel"
will that work with proprietry gefore graphics driver?
is te open source geforce driver any good? would itborkmy system trying to install it?
doesn't have 3d accel as far as I know
I think nvidia's going to support xrandr soon'ish, so in another 6 months to a year, we might have a better approach
If i fn+lc and increase res to 1680 then switch back to laptop monitor without resising down first, will it break my laptop?
no, it should just give you a bigger virtual desktop until you resize it
